T02D3357:37b-1: aa tsa la s'a dha nam /
T02D3357:37b-4: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D3357:37b-5: / pus mo'i lha nga sar btsugs pa //
T02D3357:37b-6: g-yas pa'i phyag na ral gri bsnams //
T02D3357:37b-7: de yi cig shos phyag na ni //
T02D3357:37b-8: khu tshur sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams //
T02D3357:37b-9: sku lus mkhrang zhing grims pa la //
T02D3357:37b-10: gtum zhing 'bar ba gtum pa'i spyan //
T02D3357:37b-11: bgegs 'joms mi g-yo ba yis ni//
T02D3357:37b-12: srid pa'i bgegs rnams zhi bar mdzod //
T02D3357:37b-13: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02D3357:37b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i gtso bo rnams //
T02D3357:37b-15: de la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D3357:37b-16: me tog la sogs blos mchod bya //
T02D3357:37b-17: sdug bsngal rnams las bskyab pa'i phyir //
T02D3357:37b-18: bdag nyid lus ni dbul bar bgyi ;
T02D3357:37b-19: / sngags pas dge ba spel ba'i phyir //
T02D3357:37b-20: sdig pa rnams ni bshags par bgyi //
T02D3357:37b-21: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang sems tshogs //
T02D3357:37b-22: slob dang mi slob sems can gyi //
T02D3357:37b-23: bsod nams rang bzhin ma lus pa //
T02D3357:37b-24: de la rjes su yi rang bya //
T02D3357:37b-25: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
T02D3357:37b-26: rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par bsten //
T02D3357:37b-27: tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po //
T02D3357:37b-28: rim pa ji bzhin bsgom par bya //
T02D3357:37b-29: mtshan nyid dang bral stong pa nyid //
T02D3357:37b-30: rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med //
T02D3357:37b-31: smon lam las kyang rnam grol ba'i //
T02D3357:37b-32: rang bzhin nyid du dngos po bsgom //
T02D3357:37b-33: sna tshogs padma nyi dkyil du //
T02D3357:37b-34: yi ge h'um byung bzhugs par blta //
T02D3357:37b-35: dpa' bo spyan gsum dmar ba ste //
T02D3357:37b-36: phyag gnyis rin chen cod pan can //
T02D3357:37b-37: mgon po sdig pa mod la spong //
T02D3357:37b-38: ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su skong //
T02D3357:37b-39: zar ma'i me tog lta bu'i mdog / sangs rgyas dri med 'od zer 'gyed //
T02D3357:38a-0: ya sos ma mchu rnam par @38a * //
T02D3357:38a-2: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3357:38a-3: dpal ldan khro bo gtum po che //
T02D3357:38a-4: phyag na drag shul ral gris brel //
T02D3357:38a-5: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa ste //
T02D3357:38a-6: g-yon pa'i pus mo sa la btsugs //
T02D3357:38a-7: 'jigs pa chen po zur mig gzigs //
T02D3357:38a-9: ye shes sems dpa' gzi brjid che //
T02D3357:38a-10: dam tshig sems dpa' 'dra bar lta //
T02D3357:38a-11: de nyid thugs kar sngags pa yis //
T02D3357:38a-12: sa bon mtshan mar yang dag ldan //
T02D3357:38a-13: ji srid mi skyo'i bar du'o //
T02D3357:38a-14: bsam gtan skyon lha yi ni //
T02D3357:38a-15: rnal 'byor ldan pas bzlas pa bya //
T02D3357:38a-16: de nas gsungs pa'i dngos grub ni //
T02D3357:38a-17: the tshom med pa kho nar thob //
T02D3357:38a-18: de la sngags kyi rgyal po ni 'di yin te /
T02D3357:38a-19: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D3357:38a-20: sngags kyi rgyal po ni lan cig bzlas pas sdig
T02D3357:38a-21: pa thams cad bsreg par 'gyur zhing thams cad srung
T02D3357:38a-23: 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyi 'jigs pa la /
T02D3357:38a-24: yungs kar gyis brdegs pas gdon thams cad 'byer bar byed do //
T02D3357:38a-25: kham phor la rdo rgyus kyis bris nas sgo ltag la btags na /
T02D3357:38a-26: byis pa gsar du btsas pa srung bar byed do //
T02D3357:38a-27: spra tshil gyis gzugs sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas
T02D3357:38a-28: nas de'i snying gar bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa
T02D3357:38a-29: gro ga la mngon par bris te btsugs nas /
T02D3357:38a-30: de'i kha la tsher mas btsugs na phyir rgol ba'i kha phur bus btab par 'gyur ro //
T02D3357:38a-31: rkang pa la btsugs na 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3357:38a-32: snying gar btsugs na khros pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3357:38a-33: mi'i rje ngar gyi phur bu 'am lcags kyi phur
T02D3357:38a-34: bus gang dag gi ming nas smos te de'i lus
T02D3357:38a-35: la btab na de 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D3357:38a-36: dgra bo'i sgo khar sbas na brlag par 'gyur ro //
T02D3357:38a-37: dur khrod kyi thal ba la mngon par bsngags nas
T02D3357:38a-38: dgra bo'i sgo glegs la btags na skrod par 'gyur
T02D3357:38a-39: ro // ral gri la mngon par bsngags nas g-yul du zhugs na rgyal bar 'gyur /
T02D3357:38a-40: bya ba gang la 'jug pa ni gtor ma btab ste 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3357:38a-41: sngags pa gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las gang 'dod pa bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3357:38a-42: bdag gis bris las gang 'thob pa'i //
T02D3357:38a-43: bsod nams byang chub sgrub byed pa //
T02D3357:38a-45: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub byed shog /
T02D3357:38b-0: @38b mi g-yo ba'i sgrub thabs pra bha k'a ra k'irtis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D3357:38b-1: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
